Package com.dao

Class DBApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dao.DBApplication
  • public class DBApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to create the connection to the database and different methods are defined to interact with the database.

    sagarsachdev

      • myConnection

        public java.sql.Connection myConnection()

      • saveData

        public int saveData​(java.util.List<User> ls)
        This method is used for inserting data received from jsp page into table using insert command.
        Parameters:
        ls - The method accepts List of user(s) which is/are supposed to be inserted into the database.
        Returns:
        int The method returns int value which becomes positive if the query works without any error otherwise returns non-positive value.

      • getAllData

        public java.util.List<User> getAllData()
        This method is used to retreive all the tuples from the table using select statement.
        Returns:
        List The method returns List of users whose tuple is present in the table in database.

      • validateData

        public boolean validateData​(java.util.List<Login> lst)
        This method is used to verify the details of user which are entered in the jsp page whether those values are present in the table or not.
        Parameters:
        lst - It accepts the values entered by user on jsp page in list of login object.
        Returns:
        boolean This returns true if the details are correct otherwise false.

      • getUser

        public java.util.List<User> getUser​(User u)
        This method is used for retreiving details of logged in user from table using search command
        Parameters:
        u - accepts username and passes it in form of user object which is used for retrieving details from table
        Returns:
        This returns List of user object which contains all the details of logged in user

      • buyBook

        public int buyBook​(java.util.List<Login> ls)
        This method is used to buy book from given books and deduct money from user's account.
        Parameters:
        ls - This is List of login object which is used for retrieving details of logged in user in order to deduct balance from user's account.
        Returns:
        int This returns an integer value which signies whether the query successfully worked or not.
